title: Construction of the Tabernacle Begins
summary: Exodus 36 tells how the skilled craftsmen begin building the tabernacle exactly as God commanded. The people continue to bring so many offerings that Moses tells them to stop giving.

faq.question: What did Moses do when the people brought too much?
faq.answer: He instructed them to stop bringing offerings because they had more than enough.

faq.question: What does this show about the peopleâ€™s attitude?
faq.answer: They were generous and willing to give for God's work.
